'''Bowman "Nick" Cotton''' was the fourth child of Farmer [[Tolman Cotton Senior|Tom Cotton]].<ref>{{App|Gamgee}}</ref>

==History==
With his father and his brothers, Nick fought in the [[Battle of Bywater]] against [[Saruman|Sharkey]]'s [[ruffians]].<ref>{{RK|Scouring}}</ref>
